payment.There_are_lots: There are lots of payment ways. If you prefer a payment way, which is not included in the list, please, contact us. I suppose, we will find a solution. If you pay before 1 p.m. according to Greenwich Mean Time during our working hours, your order will be sent on the same day.
payment.info: You can pay in any way convenient for you, if this method is not in the proposed options, please contact us. We would like to inform you at once that there are different delivery ways with the same result ‚Äì your order will be brought home. You must pay the delivery additionally. As soon as you choose a delivery way, we are going to inform you about its price

delivery.delivery_time_info: If you have the possibility to wait for 2 or 3 weeks, you may choose the cheapest delivery way. It is going to cost about $5-10 (depending on your location).
delivery.The_Dispatch_takes: The Dispatch takes place from the Czech Republic, the further your delivery address, the more expensive the delivery will cost. We will inform you of the exact details after placing the order
delivery.Concerning_safety: Concerning safety. We have a solid experience in the international deliveries sphere, so we know exactly the safest ways of kratom delivery. We are not going to mention the details here, but we would gladly discuss them with you during our personal conversation.
delivery.So_you_may: So you may buy kratom confidentially (being completely anonymous). You may contact us by Skype, e-mail or Messenger
